title: Mike Downey (producer) - Wikipedia
snippet: The 1980s saw Downey working as a theatre director France, Germany, the former Yugoslavia and the U.K. in theatres as varied an eclectic as The Gate (London), Bac To Bac Theatre (Exeter), Atelje 212 (Belgrade), Studiotheater and Theater Rechts der Isar (Munich) and the UK's National Student ...

title: Mike Downey (columnist) - Wikipedia
snippet: Mike Downey (August 9, 1951 – June 12, 2024) was an American newspaper columnist. He was known for his columns in the Chicago area, such as writing pieces for the Chicago Tribune, the Chicago Sun-Times and Chicago Daily News. In his later years, he began writing for the Los Angeles Times and CNN.

title: Mike Downey | Producer, Actor, Writer
snippet: Mike Downey. Producer: Elvis Walks Home. Mike Downey, producer, and CEO of Film and Music Entertainment (F&ME), launched his independent UK production company on the Frankfurt DAX in 2009.

title: Mike Downey | Producer, Executive
snippet: Mike Downey. Producer: 12 and Holding. Mike Downey was born in 1966 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. He was a producer and executive, known for 12 and Holding (2005) and Roadie (2011). He was married to Christen.
